players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. We must vote to arrest him now to protect the town."
Charlie: "I think Alice is trying to deflect attention. Why would she make such a bold claim with no evidence?"
Diana: "I think we need more than accusations without evidence. Alice, why are you so sure about Charlie?"
Charlie: "Alice is clearly the mafioso trying to frame me. Diana is asking the right questions - why would a townie make such a bold claim with zero evidence on day one?"
You: "Everyone, I understand the doubt, but I have concrete proof from last night’s investigation—Charlie is mafia. If we don’t act now, we risk losing our chance to save the town."
Diana: "Alice, if you're the detective, you should have investigated someone last night. Who did you investigate and what did you learn?"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
